package.name: acdkx_com
package.title: ACDKX COM+
package.shortdescription: ACDKX COM+ is a middleware between ACDK Objects and COM+ objects. You can use all ACDK Objects in Windows Languages, like Visual Basic, C#, VBScript, etc. You can also use all COM+ Objects in ACDK and all scripting languages like lisp, perl, tcl, python.
